page.title: 05Pastimes- Emma Freeman-Age 9
page.content: On Monday at 17:30 I go to Brownies at Bainton with my friend Alexandra. We do handicrafts, work towards our proficiency badges, collect things or play games. At 19:00 my mum collects us in our Mecedes car. This year ,to celebrate 75 years of Guiding, we went to Brownies Revels at Uppingham. We had tea, played games and sang songs. On Wednesday at 17:00 I go to Tap- Dancing class at the Welland School of Dancing in Stamford. First we do a warming up exerise and then do several routines to perform to our parents. On Friday I go to ballet classes in Stamford. We wear leotards with net skirts and ballet shoes. First we do warming exercises at the barre. Then we practice various steps and dance routines. I am now in Grade 1 for both tap dance and ballet.
